name: Pantheon of Music
description:
A 3rd person 3D musical platformer for the PC where the player must guide a herd of bulls through obstacles to reach a goal using the power of music to control a dynamically changing environment.

The player controls the Greek God Pan, who has challenged the ever-popular fellow deity of music Apollo to a music battle for all the gods and mortal alike to see.

As the god of the wild, he commands a hardy herd of bulls to carry his song far throughout the land as he makes his way up Mount Olympus for the final showdown…

Controls

WASD — Movement 
Space — Jump 
Left-shift — Sprint
Mouse — Camera Movement
MB1/scroll up — Raise Music Level
MB2/scroll down — Raise Music Level
